summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Radar de Clientes SaaS system. Backend APIs working excellently (93% success rate), frontend UI loads correctly, but onboarding form submission has integration issues preventing completion of user flow.

minor_issues.issue: Login fails for non-existent test user teste@teste.com
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - user doesn't exist in database

integration_issues.issue: Form submission not completing - stays on step 2 after clicking 'Começar!' button

passed_tests: Onboarding page loads with proper UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix onboarding form submission issue - the 'Começar!' button click is not properly submitting the business creation form or redirecting to dashboard. Check frontend form validation, API integration, and error handling in onboarding flow.
